strengths: Can take Mecatol Rex without spending 6 influence (custodians bypass)
Free space dock and PDS construction on Mecatol
weaknesses: Extremely fragile outside of Mecatol focus
Best in 3-4 player games due to double strategy card mechanic
Lack of faction abilities makes you reliant on table dynamics
tips: Configure your slice with dual planetary systems along the Mecatol path, one with a yellow skip
Function as a Mecatol deterrent — your presence there discourages others
Attempt early Mecatol capture and retention while preparing alternative scoring
Round 1 priority: Warfare or Politics plus second carrier and infantry
Fortify home system with maximum infantry
Trade-based advantage is critical; request external help from other factions
Never establish an early lead — paint no target on yourself

techPaths.name: Yellow + Blue (with yellow skip)
techPaths.note: Optimal; start Sarween Tools for unique faction strength
